storylines.name: NadineIsHome
content: Monday - 6PM
Nadine has returned home from a long day at work, her mind full of new information about HealthCorp
She needs to figure out what how she's going to break into the HealthCorp building and when.

storylines.name: DanielleCredentials-SysDecision
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: NoCredentialsDanielle
content: Nadine hears a knock at the door.
She opens it to find Danielle, holding a box.

storylines.name: AnonEmailCheck-SysDecision-1
content: NadineHitsTheJackpot-Anon

storylines.name: AnonPlansAreGreat
content: Thanks to that Anonymous sender, Nadine has a pretty good idea on how she's gonna get into the HealthCorp HQ and what time is best to strike.
According to the plans, most people are gone by about 7PM.
The only people left are some technical support staff and cleaning staff
The server room is apparently located on 26th floor of the building and is closely guarded by security and CCTV
The anonymous sender's plans end there....

storylines.name: StartEndDate-SysDecision
content: FrontDeskIsOpen

storylines.name: SheKnowsTheBestTime
content: Thanks to her questioning of the Recruiter, Nadine knows that most people are going to be leaving around 6PM, so the building will be empty around then.
Now that Nadine knows when is best to go in, she needs to figure out how she's gonna get in and how.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-SysDecision-2
content: HQPerimeter

storylines.name: UGCarPark-SysDecision-1
content: HQPerimeter

storylines.name: SheCanGoDownUnder
content: Thanks to her research, she knows that she can blag her way into the building through the underground basement

storylines.name: SheHasNoPlan
content: Nadine doesn't really have any idea what she's getting herself into right now
She's just gonna go in tomorrow morning and hope for the best.

storylines.name: NadineHasNoPlan
content: With no proper idea of how to get in the building, Nadine plans to just go to the front desk and see if she can blag her way in.

storylines.name: NadDanAtTheDoor
content: Danielle: 'hey girl! great to see you in person, I managed to score you that stuff you need.'
Nadine: 'Awesome! Thank you so much for this by the way, you're a literal lifesaver'
Danielle: 'Don't sweat it, someone needs to take those bastards down and I'm glad you're the one doing it 😊'

storylines.name: NadSaysByeToDan
content: Nadine says her goodbyes and closes the door.
She returns to the living room where she opens the box to find a basic lab uniform and a blank ID card for her to put a picture in.
Now that Nadine has a way in, she needs to find out more about the server room and what she's up against.

storylines.name: AnonEmailCheck-SysDecision-2
content: NadineHitsTheJackpot-Anon

storylines.name: NadineHasAPlan
content: Now that Nadine has an idea of what she's going to do
She prepares her laptop and other things she might need for her break in tomorrow.

storylines.name: DanielleAndNadine-SysDecision
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: CheckForTime-SysDecision
content: FrontDeskIsOpen

storylines.name: BlogFolder-SysDecision-1
content: NadineHitsTheJackpot-Anon

storylines.name: OSINTCheck-SysDecision-1
content: HQEntrance

storylines.name: OSINTCheck-SysDecision-2
content: HQPerimeter

storylines.name: OSINTCheck-SysDecision-3
content: HQCameras

storylines.name: 11AMStartNoCredentials
content: Tuesday - 11AM
After preparing what she needs to get into HealthCorp, she makes her way to the HealthCorp HQ.
Not knowing exactly what to expect when she gets there...

storylines.name: 11AMStartNoPlan
content: Tuesday - 11AM
Nadine has left her appartment and is now on her way to the HealthCorp HQ, without a solid plan but the confidence to talk her way into anywhere.
Nadine arrives at the HealthCorp building, one of the many skyscrapers in this part of the city.
Nadine enters the main entrance of the HQ and takes a look around.

storylines.name: 6PMStartHasCredentials
content: Tuesday - 6PM
After preparing what she needs to get into HealthCorp, she decides to start making her way to the HealthCorp HQ, with a solid plan

storylines.name: 6PMStart-Decision
content: How should Nadine break into the HealthCorp HQ?
Through the Underground Car Park
Via the Main Entrance

storylines.name: 6PM-UGCarPark
content: Nadine gets in her car and drives to the HealthCorp HQ.
She pulls up at the entrance to their underground car park.
As she pulls up closer, she sees the security guard in the booth, put their hand up, signalling to stop.

storylines.name: 6PM-MainEntrance
content: Nadine takes the metro to the HealthCorp HQ.
She arrives, and as she walks into the foyer, she notices that there aren't many people around.

storylines.name: 6PM-UGCarParkCredentialCheck-SysDecision
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: 6PM-UGCarPark-NadineGivesPass
content: Security-Guard: 'Evening, ID please.'
Nadine: 'Here you go.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NadineGivesCredentials
content: Nadine hands over the credentials to the Security Guard

storylines.name: UGCarPark-SecurityGuard
content: Security-Guard: 'Thank you. Can I ask what you're doing here at this hour?'

storylines.name: 6PM-UGCarPark-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Forgot something at my desk.
I was called in by my manager.
No you can't

storylines.name: 6PM-UGCarPark-MyDesk
content: Nadine: 'Oh I forgot some important files at my desk, was going to work from home tomorrow haha'
Security-Guard: 'Ahh one of those days huh? That's fine, I'll let you through.'

storylines.name: 6PM-UGCarPark-MyManager
content: Nadine: 'I was called in by my manager, not sure why but it sounded like an emergency'
Security-Guard: 'fair enough, carry on, have a good night.'
Nadine: 'Thank you sir, you too!'

storylines.name: 6PM-UGCarPark-No
content: Nadine: 'No, you can't, that's my business okay?'
Security-Guard: 'No ma'am, in fact what you do in this building IS my business.'
Security-Guard: 'I'm gonna have to ask you to park in the security bay.'

storylines.name: 6PM-MainEntranceCredentialCheck-SysDecision
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: NadWaltzesPastSecurity
content: Because Nadine already has a pass to get in, she confidently walks up to the security gates and swipes her pass through.

storylines.name: MainEntrance-MoreSecurity
content: Nadine sees the main desk staffed by three receptionists and about four security guards on the access gates, much more than she expected.

storylines.name: MainEntrance-Decision
content: What does Nadine do?
RUN AWAY - this was too difficult.
Look around for people to exploit.
Walk up to the security gates.

storylines.name: MainEntrance-RunAway
content: Nadine decides it's not worth it, she can't find a way in.
She returns back to her appartment and mopes around for the rest of the day.
Did she make the right decision?
I guess she'll never know ....

storylines.name: MainEntrance-LookForExploits
content: Nadine looks around the foyer of the HQ, looking to see if there is anyone she can use to get inside the building.
She spots a few potential people.

storylines.name: MainEntrance-SecurityGates
content: Nadine walks up to the reception desk, staffed by several receptionists, and security nearby.

storylines.name: MainEntrance-CVCheck-1
content: ME-NM-CV-Good

storylines.name: MainEntrance-CVCheck-2
content: ME-NM-CV-Bad

storylines.name: ME-Reception-1
content: Receptionist: 'Hi, how can I help you?'
Nadine: 'Hi there, I'm here for my interview.'
Receptionist: 'Okay, what department?'
Nadine: 'Marketing, the Marketing department'
Receptionist: 'Okay, bear with me...'

storylines.name: ME-Reception-2
content: She types away at his computer for a moment or two.
Then makes a phone call and pulls out something from a drawer

storylines.name: ME-Reception-3
content: Receptionist: 'That's you all set up! That pass will get you to the 13th floor, which is where the interview is being held. There will be another desk there where someone can help you.'
Nadine: 'Awesome, thank you so much!'

storylines.name: ME-NadDarren-SysDecision
content: DarrenIsAThreat

storylines.name: ME-Recep-CallDarren
content: Receptionist: 'Hi, how can I help you?'
Nadine: 'Hi there, I'm here to meet Darren Anderson.'
Receptionist: 'Okay, what department?'
Nadine: 'The Sales department'
Receptionist: 'Okay, bear with me...'

storylines.name: ME-Recep-DarrenPass
content: She types away at his computer for a moment or two.
Then makes a phone call and pulls out something from a drawer

storylines.name: ME-Recep-Darren
content: Receptionist: 'That's you all set up! That pass will get you to the 9th floor, which is where his office is.'
Nadine: 'Awesome, thank you so much!'

storylines.name: ME-NadDanielle-SysDecision
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: ME-Recep-CallDanielle
content: Receptionist: 'Hi, how can I help you?'
Nadine: 'Hi there, I'm here to meet Danielle Winters.'
Receptionist: 'Okay, what department?'
Nadine: 'The R+D department'
Receptionist: 'Okay, bear with me...'

storylines.name: ME-Recep-DaniellePass
content: She types away at his computer for a moment or two.
Then makes a phone call and pulls out something from a drawer.

storylines.name: ME-Recep-Danielle
content: Receptionist: 'That's you all set up! That pass will get you to the 22nd floor, which is where she is based.'
Nadine: 'Awesome, thank you so much!'

storylines.name: ME-SwipePass
content: Nadine walks over to the security gate and swipes her card.

storylines.name: ME-ToTheLifts
content: Nadine makes her way to the lifts, where she walks into a lift, no-one else is with her.
She notices a contact point for her swipe card.
There's a guide on the wall noting what's on all of the floors

storylines.name: ME-Recep-JustAsk
content: Receptionist: 'Hi, how can I help you?'
Nadine: 'Hi there. Can you let me in please?'
Receptionist: 'Are you here to visit someone?'
Nadine: 'Ermm, not really.'
Receptionist: 'Okay, I can't just let you in, so please leave otherwise I will call Security'

storylines.name: ME-Recep-NadineJustLeaves
content: Nadine doesn't really know what to do, so after exhausting all of her options, she just leaves and goes home.

storylines.name: ME-AnonPlan-SysDecision
content: NadineHitsTheJackpot-Anon

storylines.name: Lift-WithAnonPlans
content: Which button does Nadine press?
Floor 26 for the Server Room
Floor 22 for the R&D department
Floor 13 for the Marketing department
Floor 9 for the Sales department

storylines.name: Lift-NoAnonPlans
content: Which button does Nadine press?
Floor 25 for the Technical department
Floor 22 for the R&D department
Floor 13 for the Marketing department
Floor 9 for the Sales department

storylines.name: ServerRoom-Narration
content: Thanks to the plans she acquired from the Anonymous sender, she knows exactly which floor the server room is on.
She presses the button for Floor 26.

storylines.name: ServerRoom-SysDecision
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: ServerRoom-LiftMoves
content: But the lift doesn't move.
The contact point is flashing red angrily.
Nadine remembers her pass that Danielle gave her!
She puts it up against the reader, it flashes a happy green colour and the lift starts its' ascent to the 26th floor.

storylines.name: InTheServerRoom-NadineAlone-SysDecision
content: ServerRoom-LiftMoves

storylines.name: ITSR-Alone
content: Nadine arrives at the Server Room floor, it's pretty bare bones up here.
There is a small work area for the Technical staff.
At the back, Nadine spots a mantrap to get into what she assumes is the server room.

storylines.name: ITSR-A-2
content: Nadine approaches the mantrap for the server room and scans her pass from Danielle on the mantrap.
She steps inside, scans her pass again and watches as the mantrap closes her entrance door and opens the server room door.
Nadine enters the server room area and makes her way to the server room cages.

storylines.name: ITSR-TourGuide-SysDecision-Justin
content: Tech-RH-Escort

storylines.name: ITSR-TourGuide-SysDecision-Richard
content: R&D-P-Richard-Lift

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Justin
content: Nadine and Justin arrive at the Server Room floor, it's pretty bare bones up here.
There is a small work area for the Technical staff.
At the back, Nadine spots a mantrap to get into what she assumes is the server room.

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Richard
content: Nadine and Richard arrive at the Server Room floor, it's pretty bare bones up here.
There is a small work area for the Technical staff.
At the back, Nadine spots a mantrap to get into what she assumes is the server room.

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Simon
content: Nadine and Simon arrive at the Server Room floor, it's pretty bare bones up here.
There is a small work area for the Technical staff.
At the back, Nadine spots a mantrap to get into what she assumes is the server room.

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Simon-2
content: Simon: 'So this is the work area for the Server technicians, and at the back is how they get into the server room.'
Nadine: 'Ahh cool!'
Simon: 'So let's go through to the server room and show you all the cool stuff.'

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Justin-2
content: Justin: 'So this is the work area for the Server technicians, and at the back is how they get into the server room.'
Nadine: 'Ahh cool!'
Justin: 'So let's go through to the server room and show you all the cool stuff.'

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Richard-2
content: Richard: 'So this is the work area for the Server technicians, and at the back is how they get into the server room.'
Nadine: 'Ahh cool!'
Richard: 'So let's go through to the server room and show you all the cool stuff.'

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Simon-3
content: They walk past the cubicles and approach the mantrap into the server room.

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Justin-3
content: They walk past the cubicles and approach the mantrap into the server room.

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Richard-3
content: They walk past the cubicles and approach the mantrap into the server room.

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Simon-4
content: Simon: 'I'll have to let you in and give you my pass to scan through, then you can scan me through once you've gotten across, got it?'
Nadine: 'Yep, sounds like a plan to me.'

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Justin-4
content: Justin: 'I'll have to let you in and give you my pass to scan through, then you can scan me through once you've gotten across, got it?'
Nadine: 'Yep, sounds like a plan to me.'

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Richard-4
content: Richard: 'I'll have to let you in and give you my pass to scan through, then you can scan me through once you've gotten across, got it?'
Nadine: 'Yep, sounds like a plan to me.'

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Simon-5
content: Simon scans his card and then hands it to Nadine.
Nadine enters the mantrap and watches as it closes on her.
After it closes, a contact point flashes red angrily at her.
She swipes Simon's pass and it goes a happy green colour.
The other side of the mantrap opens, releasing Nadine into the server room

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Justin-5
content: Justin scans his card and then hands it to Nadine.
Nadine enters the mantrap and watches as it closes on her.
After it closes, a contact point flashes red angrily at her.
She swipes Justin's pass and it goes a happy green colour.
The other side of the mantrap opens, releasing Nadine into the server room

storylines.name: ITSR-TG-Richard-5
content: Richard scans his card and then hands it to Nadine.
Nadine enters the mantrap and watches as it closes on her.
After it closes, a contact point flashes red angrily at her.
She swipes Richard's pass and it goes a happy green colour.
The other side of the mantrap opens, releasing Nadine into the server room

storylines.name: ITSR-ServerRoom-Decision
content: What does Nadine do?
Run away into the server room.
Press the SEAL button on the mantrap, in order to lock the mantrap.

storylines.name: ITSR-SR-Run
content: Nadine immeadiately makes a run for the server room cages.
The tour guide bangs on the mantrap, unable to stop Nadine from getting into the server room.

storylines.name: FINISH
content: FINISH

storylines.name: ITSR-SR-Seal
content: Nadine walks into the server room area and hits the Seal button on the mantrap.
Both doors for the mantrap close and the tour guide is standing on the other side, very confused at what has just happened.
A red light flashes on the man trap, and the swipe points deactivate.

storylines.name: ServerRoom-NoPermission
content: But the lift doesn't move.
The contact point is flashing red angrily.
Looks like Nadine needs to score some credentials or a ride up there before she can get to the Server Room.

storylines.name: Lift-22
content: Nadine decides that her best shot at messing with HealthCorp is their R+D department.

storylines.name: R&D-Reasoning
content: Nadine: 'Disrupt and expose how they can rip people off '
Nadine: 'that ought to do it...'

storylines.name: R&D-UpWeGo
content: Nadine presses the button for the 22nd floor and the lift starts its' ascent.

storylines.name: R&D-Arrived
content: Nadine arrives at the Research and Development Lab.The R+D floor looks like a startup company, very modern and very sleek.
There are lots of computers and pieces of computers scattered around the place, like a child who left their toys about.

storylines.name: R&D-NadDanielle-SysDecision
content: MarcusHasTea

storylines.name: R&D-NadSpotsDanielle
content: She stops when she recognises someone she's seen before.

storylines.name: R&D-Circular
content: What does Nadine do?
Go to a vacant computer.
Have a look around.
Go talk to a random person

storylines.name: R&D-People-SysDecision
content: R&D-P-Finneas

storylines.name: R&D-NoOneThere
content: There is no one here to speak to, Nadine should do something else.

storylines.name: R&D-People
content: Nadine decides to talk to some of the people in the break room. She approaches an older man.

storylines.name: R&D-P-Finneas
content: Nadine: 'Hi there, how are you? I'm Rachel, nice to meet you.'
Finneas: 'Oh hello there, My name is Dr Finneas Humphrey, great to meet you.'
Finneas: 'Are you new to the Department? I don't believe I've seen you around here before'
Nadine: 'Oh I'm new here! I started a couple days ago.'
Finneas: 'Ah that'll do it haha, so many new faces around, you lose track at my age.'
Nadine: 'I was wondering if you could tell me more about HealthCorp'
Finneas: 'Well I've worked here most of my life, what do you wanna know?'

storylines.name: R&D-P-Finneas-SysDecision
content: WhoAreTheInnerCircle

storylines.name: R&D-P-Finneas-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
About the Server Room.
HealthCorp targets.

storylines.name: R&D-P-Finneas-Decision-IC
content: What does Nadine say?
About the Server Room.
Who are the Inner Circle?
HealthCorp targets.

storylines.name: R&D-P-ServerRoom
content: Nadine: 'What do you know about the server room?'
Finneas: 'Not a lot really, being in R&D we don't really deal with it that much.'
Finneas: 'It's on the 26th floor, with the rest of the Technical department. When we do have trouble, I get in touch with a man called Richard who knows a lot about all of that IT mumbo jumbo.'
Nadine: 'Do you think I could meet Richard? I'd love to learn more about all of that...'
Finneas: 'IT mumbo jumbo? Yes of course, I'll see if he's available now to take you up for a tour'

storylines.name: R&D-P-FinneasCalls
content: Finneas reaches into his pocket and pulls out his phone to text Richard.
Almost immeadiately, he hears back.

storylines.name: R&D-P-FinneasIsShook
content: Finneas: 'My, that was quick! He said he'd love to and he's on his way down.'
Finneas: 'Lucky you! Good thing we met hoho!'
Nadine: 'Definitely, thank you so much Doctor Humphrey!'
Finneas: 'Oh please, call me Finneas. Well I must be off, I will be seeing you soon Rachel, I'm sure.'

storylines.name: R&D-P-FinneasBye-2
content: Finneas leaves the break room and shortly after, so does Nadine.
She returns to the foyer of the R&D floor, where a man is standing, waiting. Nadine approaches him.

storylines.name: R&D-P-Richard
content: Richard: 'Ahh you must be Rachel! Name's Richard, Finneas told me that you wanted to take a look around the server room?'
Nadine: 'That's right! I'm interested in how the R&D department use technology to improve the services for HealthCorp'
Richard: 'Naturally, right this way, let's start the tour!'

storylines.name: R&D-P-Richard-Lift
content: They both enter the lift.
Richard scans his pass against the contact point and presses the button for the server room.

storylines.name: R&D-P-InnerCircle
content: Nadine: 'I overheard some people talking about the Inner Circle, what's that?'
Finneas: 'What? Where did you hear that?'
Nadine: 'Just around the office, why?'
Finneas: 'You don't talk about the Inner Circle, especially here. Excuse me, I have to go.'

storylines.name: R&D-P-SecurityGuards
content: Finneas quickly left the break room.
A few moments later, three security guards came into the break room and apprehended Nadine.

storylines.name: R&D-P-HealthCorp
content: Nadine: 'I just wanted to know more about how HealthCorp targets their insurance'
Finneas: 'Ahh now that is interesting.'
Finneas: 'They do a lot of research into how terminal illnesses like cystic fibrosis and cancer work between the generations, to predict who to aim their insurance at'
Finneas: 'Aim at the long game, yknow?'
Nadine: 'Wow, that's crazy, how does no one know about it?'
Finneas: 'I'd wager that no one outside these four walls knows about it.'
Finneas: 'Friends in high places and all that, anyway, I best be getting back to work, you stay safe Nadine.'
Nadine: 'Sure, it was great talking to you Finneas, thank you...'

storylines.name: R&D-P-FinneasBye
content: He gets up and leaves the break room.
After a few moments, Nadine also leaves the break room.

storylines.name: R&D-LookAround-OSINT-SysDecision
content: HQCameras

storylines.name: R&D-LookAround-OSINT-Warning
content: Nadine remembers the cameras that HealthCorp have set up and is now doubting whether she should wander aimlessly around the floor.

storylines.name: R&D-LookAround-Decision
content: What should Nadine do?
Still have a look around.
Do something else.

storylines.name: R&D-LookAround-GoodChoice
content: Nadine decides to avoid the cameras and think of something else to do

storylines.name: R&D-NadDanielle-1
content: Nadine: 'Danielle! Hey girl!'
Danielle: 'Oh hey! Come over here!'
Nadine: 'Sure, where are we goi-'

storylines.name: R&D-NadDanielle-2
content: Danielle whisks Nadine away to an empty conference room.

storylines.name: R&D-DanielleLikeNad-SysDecision
content: ImpressedDanielle

storylines.name: R&D-DanielleGetOut
content: Nadine: 'What the hell are you doing?'
Danielle: 'What the hell am I doing?? What the hell are YOU doing?'
Danielle: 'You're meant to be on your way to taking down HealthCorp, not galavanting round R+D'
Nadine: 'I was just curious okay? Jeez.'
Danielle: 'Now is not the time for all that, you are going to get your butt up to that server room and do whatever hacker mumbo jumbo you need to do to get in and end this nightmare.'

storylines.name: R&D-DanielleRushesNad
content: Danielle rushes Nadine out of the conference room to the lift.

storylines.name: R&D-DanielleTechniciansPass-1
content: Nadine: 'What the hell are you doing?'
Danielle: 'What the hell am I doing?? What the hell are YOU doing?'
Nadine: 'What does it look like? I broke in!'
Danielle: 'Okay then why are you here now?'
Nadine: 'Well, I wanted to expose the new ways HealthCorp is finding to rip people off, yknow, to expose them.'
Danielle: 'Hmph, you won't find that here, where do you think all of that information is stored dummy?'
Danielle: 'Here take this technician's pass, I was going to give it to you but I didn't think you were actually serious.'

storylines.name: R&D-DanielleTechniciansPass-2
content: Danielle hands her a technician's pass.

storylines.name: R&D-DanielleServerRoom
content: Danielle: 'The server room is on the 26th floor, you'll need to be quick and stay undetected'
Nadine: 'Got it, thank you so much Danielle. I owe you one'
Danielle: 'No problem, stay safe Nadine.'
Nadine: 'You too.'

storylines.name: R&D-NadDanServerRoom
content: Danielle rushes Nadine out of the conference room to the lift.
She gets in and presses the button for the server room.
She puts it up against the reader and it flashes a happy green colour.
The lift starts its' ascent to the 26th floor

storylines.name: Lift-13
content: Nadine arrives at the Marketing floor.
This floor is minimalistic and modern, there are lots of creative spaces and conference rooms. Nadine feels very out of place.
She is approached by a woman in a sleek black dress.

storylines.name: Marketing-Intro
content: Nadine arrives at the Marketing floor.
This floor is minimalistic and modern, there are lots of creative spaces and conference rooms. Nadine feels very out of place.
She is approached by a woman in a sleek black dress.

storylines.name: Marketing-Approached
content: Marketing-Woman: 'Hello there, you seem lost, can I help you?'

storylines.name: Marketing-A-Decision-SysDecision-1
content: ME-NM-CV-Good

storylines.name: Marketing-A-Decision-SysDecision-2
content: ME-NM-CV-Bad

storylines.name: Marketing-A-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Yes.
No.
I have an interview.

storylines.name: M-A-D-Yes
content: Nadine: 'Actually yes, I'm meeting with someone in the break room, do you know where that is?'
Marketing-Woman: 'Of course! I'll take you there!'
Nadine: 'Fab! Thank you.'

storylines.name: M-A-D-BreakRoom
content: The Woman directs her to the break room. They say their goodbyes and Nadine enters the break room. It's a beautiful space.

storylines.name: M-A-D-Circular
content: What does Nadine do?
Talk to a random person.
Take a look around.
Leave.
Look at the noticeboard.

storylines.name: M-A-D-Leave-SysDecision-1
content: M-A-D-RandomPerson

storylines.name: M-A-D-Leave-SysDecision-2
content: M-A-D-LookAround

storylines.name: M-A-D-Leave-SysDecision-3
content: M-A-D-Notices

storylines.name: Marketing-Leave
content: Nadine decides to leave, she's seen enough here. She returns to the lift.

storylines.name: Marketing-DoSomethingFirst
content: Nadine thinks about leaving but dismisses it, she should investigate this floor at least a little bit before she leaves.

storylines.name: M-A-D-RandomPerson
content: Nadine decides to talk to some of the people in the break room. She approaches a young man.

storylines.name: MAD-YoungMan
content: Nadine: 'Hi there, how are you? My name is Shontelle, nice to meet you.'
Steve: 'Why hello Shontelle, aren't you a sight for sore eyes? Name's Steve, pleasure.'
Steve: 'Haven't seen you around before, you new?'
Nadine: 'Yeah, I started recently.'
Steve: 'Ah thought so, anyways, what's up?'

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-SysDecision
content: WhoAreTheInnerCircle

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-Decision-IC
content: What does Nadine say?
Tell me about the Server Room.
What do you know about the Inner Circle?
HealthCorp marketing strategies.

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Tell me about the Server Room.
HealthCorp marketing strategies.

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-ServerRoom
content: Nadine: 'What do you know about the server room?'
Steve: 'What, those nerds? Nothing much, just the guys we shout at when the servers are being too slow.'
Steve: 'Why do you care about all that? You're a chick.'
Nadine: 'So what? Chicks can't like technology? Is that what you're saying smart ass?'
Steve: 'Nah of course not, that's not what I mea-'
Nadine: 'Save it, so who do you go to when the server's are being slow?'
Steve: 'Well our guy from Technical is a guy called Simon, I- I- can give him a call for you, see if he can show you around?'
Nadine: 'That would be fantastic, Steve. Please do.'

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-CallSimon
content: Steve fumbles around his pocket and pulls out his phone to call Simon.
Steve talks very loudly on the phone, which makes the other people in the room stare at Steve like the imbecile he really is.
Steve puts the phone down and looks at Nadine with a wide grin.

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-MeetSimon
content: Steve: 'Good news baby-'
Nadine: 'Mmm don't call me that.'
Steve: 'Noted, does not like babies. Neither do I sweetie'
Nadine: 'Or that, what did Simon say?'
Steve: 'Well, Simon said let's go on a date, that's what he said ;)'
Nadine: 'Oh save it, what did he say?'
Steve: 'Ugh how boring, he said he'd love to - he's gonna meet you outside the lifts in 5.'
Nadine: 'Great.'
Steve: 'So about that date?'
Nadine: 'How about no, Steve. Let's start there.'

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-IsUpset
content: Steve, rejected, grumbles and returns to whatever he was doing on his phone.
Nadine leaves the break room and returns to the foyer.
A few moments later, a man arrives via one of the lifts. Nadine approaches him.

storylines.name: MAD-Simon-Nadine
content: Simon: 'Ahh you must be Nadine! Name's Simon, Steve said that you wanted to take a look around the server room?'
Nadine: 'That's right! I love tech and I heard that HealthCorp had some of the finest in the city'
Simon: 'You heard right! Come right this way, let's start the tour!'

storylines.name: MAD-Simon-ServerRoom
content: They both enter the lift.
Simon scans his pass against the contact point and presses the button for the server room.

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-InnerCircle
content: Nadine: 'I overheard some people talking about the Inner Circle, what's that about?'
Steve: 'Um where did you hear that?'
Nadine: 'Just around the office, why?'
Steve: 'Nothing, I don't know anything about that. I'm sorry, I got to go.'

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-IC-Bye
content: Steve quickly left the break room.
A few moments later, three security guards came into the break room and apprehended Nadine.

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-MarketingHC
content: Nadine: 'How does HealthCorp market itself to people? Yknow, how do they convince people to go for them?'
Steve: 'Two words: Protect your image.'
Steve: 'Actually that's three but you know what I mean'
Nadine: 'Uhhh...'
Steve: 'Look, HealthCorp spend millions protecting their image, whether that be in R&D or in the press, it's all about protecting their investment'
Nadine: 'Their investment?'
Steve: 'You know what I mean, don't act new, okay?'
Steve: 'Anyways, enough with the shop talk, what else dya wanna know from me, the Oracle of HealthCorp? 😜'

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-MarketingHC-SysDecision
content: MAD-Steve-MarketingHC

storylines.name: MAD-Steve-MHC-AskedBefore
content: You've already asked Steve this, ask him something else.

storylines.name: MAD-LA-SysDecision
content: M-A-D-LookAround

storylines.name: MAD-LA-DoSomethingElse
content: Nadine has already had a look around, she should find other ways to get to the server room.

storylines.name: M-A-D-LookAround
content: She notices an empty conference room with several whiteboards.
When Nadine approaches the conference room, she notices that the whiteboards have lots of writing on.
A curious Nadine enters the conference room to get a closer look at the whiteboards.

storylines.name: MAD-Whiteboards
content: From what Nadine can gather, it looks like a basic view at a new targetting tool.
It looks like it's somehow using data to target people who are predisposed to certain diseases.
Unfortunately, the whiteboards don't describe it in a lot of detail...
As Nadine turns to leave, a Security Guard blocks her path at the door.

storylines.name: MAD-Whiteboards-SG
content: Security-Guard: 'What are you doing in here? Show me your pass.'

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
No.
Yes.

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-Yes
content: Nadine: 'Sure! Hang on.'

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-No
content: Nadine: 'No you can't. Why should I show you my ID?'
Security-Guard: 'Ma'am if you don't show me your ID, I will be forced to arrest you.'
Nadine: 'You ain't gonna do shit.'
Security-Guard: 'That's it, you're coming with me'

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-CC-SysDecision
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-HasCreds
content: Nadine hands her pass over to the Security Guard.
He inspects it and then hands it back to Nadine.

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-AllClear
content: Security-Guard: 'Everything seems to be in order here, carry on'
Nadine: 'Thank you sir.'

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-ByeGirl
content: The Security Guard saunters away.

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-NoCreds
content: Nadine: 'Erm, I can't seem to find it.'
Security-Guard: 'Mmhmm okay, what are you doing here without your pass?'

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-NC-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Nothing.
It's at my desk.

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-NC-Nothing
content: Nadine: 'Nothing really, just reading the noticeboard.'
Security-Guard: 'Oh that's all?'
Security-Guard: 'You're coming with me.'

storylines.name: MAD-W-SG-NC-Desk
content: Nadine: 'Just reading the notices, my pass must be at my desk!'
Security-Guard: 'All staff are required to wear their work pass on them at all times, everyone does. I think you should come with me.

storylines.name: M-A-D-Notices
content: Nadine takes a look at the noticeboard in the communal area.
It's covered with a bunch of mundane notices.
Zumba with Karen, Chess lessons from Charlie and someone looking for a Math tutor.

storylines.name: MAD-Notices-Capitalism
content: Nadine wonders why you're wasting time reading this when there are people dying because of capitalism.

storylines.name: M-A-D-No
content: Nadine: 'No thank you, I'm alright, just waiting for someone'
Marketing-Woman: 'Oh okay! Well let me know if you need anything.'

storylines.name: M-A-D-Foyer
content: The Woman walks away, leaving Nadine alone in the foyer of the Marketing floor.

storylines.name: M-A-D-Interview
content: Nadine: 'Actually yes, I have an interview, would you be able to direct me?'
Marketing-Woman: 'Of course! I think they're happening in Conference Room 3, I'll take you there!'
Nadine: 'Fab! Thank you.'

storylines.name: M-A-D-Interview-CF
content: The Woman directs her to a room with three people sat at a board room style table. Nadine stops before she goes in

storylines.name: M-A-D-Interview-Bathroom
content: Nadine: 'Umm actually, do you know where the bathroom is? I wanna freshen up before I go in.'
Marketing-Woman: 'Oh of course, it's down the hall to the left, I'll just let them know that you'll be a few minutes, ok hon?'
Nadine: 'Okay, thank you so much! Be right back..'

storylines.name: M-A-D-Bathroom
content: Nadine watches the woman enter the conference room and then power walks to the bathroom.

storylines.name: Marketing-A-Decision-NoInterview
content: What does Nadine say?
Yes.
No.

storylines.name: Lift-9
content: Nadine decides her best shot to mess with HealthCorp is with their Sales teams and so she decides to go there.
She presses the button and the lift starts zooming up to the 9th floor.
Nadine quickly arrives at the sales floor.

storylines.name: SalesFloor
content: The Sales floor is like a circus. There are phones are ringing off the hook, hundreds of people talking into headsets in their cubicles.
Managers are floating around like spectre, watching over the dead...
One of these spectres approaches Nadine.

storylines.name: SF-TimeCheck-SysDecision
content: 6PMStartHasCredentials

storylines.name: SF-Darren-Late
content: Darren: 'You. What are you doing here so late?'

storylines.name: SF-Darren-OtherLate
content: Darren: 'You. You're late, what time do you call this, eh?'

storylines.name: SF-Decision
content: What does Nadine do?
Hey Darren.
Check your watch hun 🙄
I forgot my pass.

storylines.name: SF-HeyDarren
content: Nadine: 'Hey there Darren, good to see you in person.'
Darren: 'I'm sorry, do I know you??'
Nadine: 'I enjoyed our little conversation yesterday.'

storylines.name: SF-CYW
content: Nadine: 'I don't know, how about you check your watch hon'
Darren: 'Ohh how funny and original.'

storylines.name: SF-ForgotPass
content: Nadine: 'I forgot my pass, I had to wait for security to let me in'
Darren: 'Hmph, what's your name?'

storylines.name: SF-WhatsYourName
content: Darren: 'What's your name?'
Nadine: 'Name's Jackie, but everyone calls me Jack'

storylines.name: SF-DarrenLike-SysDecision
content: ND-NadsTrustsDarren-CHECK

storylines.name: SF-DarrenLikesJack
content: Darren: 'Wait, you're Jack? I was expecting someone more...'
Nadine: '... more like a man, not the first time let me tell ya'

storylines.name: SF-DarrenNoLikeJack
content: Darren: 'So you're Jack. Figures, you'd be a liar and a snake too.'
Nadine: 'I'm sorry, things got off on the wrong foot between us.'

storylines.name: SF-DarrenHate-SysDecision
content: DarrenIsAThreat

storylines.name: SF-DarrenTriesToGetYourTrust
content: Darren: 'I just wanna say that you can trust me, like I want to see HealthCorp pay for what they have done to all those people, it's not right at all.'
Nadine: 'Alright, alright, I believe you, but I need your help to get into the server room.'
Nadine: 'I need a pass to get in there and I have nothing, can you help?'
Darren: 'Of course doll, come with me to my office, I can score you a pass'

storylines.name: SF-DarrensOffice
content: Darren leads Nadine to a medium sized office.
He sits behind a desk and offers Nadine a seat.
They both sit down and Darren starts typing on his computer.
After a few moments, Darren prints something.

storylines.name: SF-DarrenPass
content: Darren: 'Lucky for you, I have some friends up in the Technical department who share our interests.'
Darren: 'I will give this pass to you on one condition'
Nadine: 'What is it?'
Darren: 'You have to expose the Inner Circle. They've messed with enough people's lives. We got a deal?'
Nadine: 'Doesn't look like I have much of a choice, you'd call security on me if I don't, wouldn't you?'
Darren: 'Naturally 🤷‍♂️🤷‍♂️🤷‍♂️'
Nadine: 'Figures. Fine, you got it. One company sized expose coming right up'
Darren: 'That's what I like to hear'

storylines.name: SF-DarrenPass-Gives
content: Darren hands the temporary pass to the server room to Nadine.

storylines.name: SF-Darren-ServerRoom
content: Darren: ' Server room's on the 26th floor, good luck hon, you're gonna need it to hack in'
Nadine: 'Thanks, see you on the other side'

storylines.name: SF-DarrenOffice-NadineLeaves
content: Nadine leaves Darren's office and returns to the lift.
She gets in and presses the button for the server room

storylines.name: SF-DarrenSellsYouOut
content: Darren: 'Frankly no, why should I help you?'
Nadine: 'Because I made it here! I'm so close to getting in, I just need someone to point me in the right direction.'
Darren: 'Hmph, let me see what I can do.'

storylines.name: SF-DarrenSellsYouOut-2
content: Darren saunters off and disappears into an office, leaving Nadine on the sales floor looking rather sheepish.
A few moments later, the lift doors open and four security guards file out. They spot Nadine instantly and grab her.
She is quickly apprehended and as she is being taken away to the lift, she spots Darren smiling at her menacingly.

storylines.name: Lift-25
content: Nadine decides her best shot to mess with HealthCorp is with their server room.
The Technical department is the best place to start.
She presses the button and the lift starts zooming up to the 25th floor.

storylines.name: Tech-Arrival
content: Nadine arrives at the Technical department.
This floor seems very relaxed with an open working area, filled with whiteboards and computer work stations.
It doesn't seem to be that busy right now...
There are a couple of people typing away at their computers.

storylines.name: Tech-Circular
content: What does Nadine do?
Find the break room.
Go to a vacant computer.
Have a look around.
Talk to a random person.

storylines.name: Tech-BreakRoom-SysDecision
content: Tech-BreakRoom

storylines.name: Tech-BR-AlreadyBeen
content: Nadine has already been in the break room, she should go somewhere else.

storylines.name: Tech-BreakRoom
content: Nadine sees a sign for the break room and wanders over to it.
There are two people inside, both pre-occupied with their own devices.
Nadine goes to talk to one of the men, reading a newspaper.

storylines.name: Tech-BR-Daniel
content: Nadine: 'Hi there, my name is Nadine, what's your name?'
Daniel: 'Hm? oh hello, Daniel.'
Nadine: 'Soooo what did you do today?'
Daniel: 'Hm? oh just working on a project'
Nadine: 'Oh cool, what project?'
Daniel: 'Look I'm just trying to enjoy my break.'
Nadine: 'Oh sorry, okay, I'll just-'

storylines.name: Tech-BR-Bye
content: Nadine awkwardly leaves the table Daniel is sat at and proceeds to leave the break room.

storylines.name: Tech-Computer-SysDecision
content: Tech-Computer

storylines.name: Tech-Computer-AlreadyBeen
content: Nadine has already been on a vacant computer, she should do something else.

storylines.name: Tech-Computer
content: Nadine finds an empty workstation. No one is logged in.

storylines.name: Tech-C-Anon-SysDecision
content: NadineHitsTheJackpot-Anon

storylines.name: Tech-C-Anon-DA
content: Nadine decides to launch a dictionary attack on the work station in an attempt to gain access.
Nadine managed to brute force her way into the work station!
Nadine's attack failed!

storylines.name: Tech-C-HackFailed
content: She is locked out from the PC.
A message pops up on screen saying 'Security has been notified of this intrusion'.
Nadine gets up to make her way to the lift. A Security Guard runs around the corner and pulls out a gun.

storylines.name: Tech-C-SG-Gun
content: Security-Guard: 'Stop right there!'

storylines.name: Tech-C-SG-Decision
content: Does Nadine comply?
Yes.
No.

storylines.name: Tech-C-SG-Yes
content: Nadine: 'Okay okay! Don't shoot!'
Security-Guard: 'Hands on your head! Kneel SLOWLY!'

storylines.name: Tech-C-SG-Surrounded
content: Nadine puts her hands behinds her head and kneels to the ground.
She is quickly surrounded a team of Security Guards and is apprehended.

storylines.name: Tech-C-SG-No
content: Nadine: 'You won't catch me alive!'

storylines.name: Tech-C-SG-ShotsFired
content: The Security Guard doesn't hesitate to shoot Nadine.
She falls to the ground as a team of Security Guards swarm the floor.

storylines.name: NadinesDeathNews
content: The following day, news of her attempted break-in leak to the press.
Although few do report it out of fear of being sued by HealthCorp, Nadine is seen as a martyr by those who look to take HealthCorp down.
A symbol for some, a waste to others, anonymous to the rest...
....but did she act too rashly?

storylines.name: Tech-C-Anon-AccessGranted
content: Thanks to the plans Nadine got from the Anonymous Sender, she has valid credentials to get into the workstation.

storylines.name: Tech-C-Intranet
content: Once in, she browses to the company network until she finds the company intranet.
It shows the number of people taking out insurance has gone up since they trialled a new targetting tool.

storylines.name: Tech-C-Intranet-2
content: The post doesn't really say much more about the tool or if they've deployed it.
Nadine couldn't really find anything else of interest.

storylines.name: Tech-LookAround-SysDecision
content: Tech-LookAround

storylines.name: Tech-StopLookingAround
content: Nadine has already had a look around, she should focus on the task at hand.

storylines.name: Tech-LookAround-OSINTCheck-SysDecision
content: HQCameras

storylines.name: Tech-LookAround-Warning
content: Nadine remembers the cameras that HealthCorp have set up and is now doubting whether she should wander aimlessly around the floor.

storylines.name: Tech-LookAround-Decision
content: What should Nadine do?
Still have a look around.
Do something else.

storylines.name: Tech-LookAround-GoodChoice
content: Nadine decides to avoid the cameras and think of something else to do

storylines.name: Tech-LookAround
content: Nadine decides to have a look around the floor.
She turns a corner and starts to read a noticeboard. It has some notices, all fairly mundane community notices, nothing of note really...
A few moments later, a security guard on patrol approaches her.

storylines.name: Tech-SecurityGuard
content: Security-Guard: 'Excuse me, can I see your pass from you please?'

storylines.name: Tech-SecurityGuard-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Sure thing.
No.

storylines.name: Tech-SG-Yes
content: Nadine: 'Sure! Hang on.'

storylines.name: Tech-SG-CC-SysDecision
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: Tech-SG-HasCreds
content: Nadine hands her pass over to the Security Guard.
He inspects it and then hands it back to Nadine.

storylines.name: Tech-SG-NoCreds
content: Nadine: 'Erm, I can't seem to find it.'
Security-Guard: 'Mmhmm okay, what are you doing here without your pass?'

storylines.name: Tech-SG-NC-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Nothing.
It's at my desk.
Working, duh. 🙄

storylines.name: Tech-SG-NC-Nothing
content: Nadine: 'Nothing really, just reading the noticeboard.'
Security-Guard: 'Oh that's all?'
Security-Guard: 'You're coming with me.'

storylines.name: Tech-SG-NC-Desk
content: Nadine: 'Just reading the notices, my pass must be at my desk!'
Security-Guard: 'All staff are required to wear their work pass on them at all times, everyone does. I think you should come with me.

storylines.name: Tech-SG-NC-Working
content: Nadine: 'Working, what does it look like?'
Security-Guard: 'Sure doesn't look like a whole lot staring at a noticeboard. I think you should come with me

storylines.name: Tech-SG-Busted
content: Nadine is led away to a room for questioning.

storylines.name: NadineDevicesSeized
content: After seizing her devices and hours of questioning, it doesn't take them long to figure out why she was there,

storylines.name: Tech-SG-AllClear
content: Security-Guard: 'Everything seems to be in order here, carry on'
Nadine: 'Thank you sir.'

storylines.name: Tech-SG-ByeGirl
content: The Security Guard saunters away.

storylines.name: Tech-SG-No
content: Nadine: 'No you can't. Why should I show you my ID?'
Security-Guard: 'Ma'am if you don't show me your ID, I will be forced to arrest you.'
Nadine: 'You ain't gonna do shit.'
Security-Guard: 'That's it, you're coming with me'

storylines.name: Tech-SG-No-Apprehended
content: The Security Guard lunges for Nadine and arrests her.

storylines.name: Tech-RandomHuman
content: Nadine notices someone walking her way texting on their phone and decides that they would be good to talk to.

storylines.name: Tech-RandomHuman-1
content: Nadine: 'Hi there! My name is Carol, would you be able to help me?'
Justin: 'Oh, hi Carol, my name is Justin, sure, what's up?'
Nadine: 'I'm an intern, and my boss asked me to meet him in the server room to take a look at an ongoing issue he's been working on. '
Nadine: 'But he didn't tell me how to get there or where it is, guess he just assumed I knew where it was haha 😅'

storylines.name: Tech-RHTime-SysDecision
content: 6PMStartHasCredentials

storylines.name: Tech-RH-InternWorkingLate
content: Justin: 'Bit late to be working even for an intern, no?'
Nadine: 'Uhhh, yeah he just makes us work really late.'
Justin: 'Hmm okay, I've got some time, I'll take you up.'
Nadine: 'Ah thank you!'

storylines.name: Tech-RH-Relatable
content: Justin: 'Ah, I know that feeling. Tell you what, I've got some time, hwo about I take you there!'
Nadine: 'That would be great! Thank you so much!'

storylines.name: Tech-RH-Escort
content: Justin leads Nadine into a lift.
He scans his pass and presses the button for the 26th floor and they reach the server room floor in no time.

storylines.name: MainEntrance-LookForExploits-Decision
content: Which one does Nadine pick?
Nerdy looking woman.
Nervous looking man.
Guy in a suit.

storylines.name: ME-NerdyWoman
content: Nadine approaches a nerdy looking woman, typing on her computer at a rapid speed.

storylines.name: ME-NW-1
content: Nadine: 'hi my name is Michonne, I was wondering if you could help me?'
Tammy: 'oh hi there Michonne! it's great to meet you! My name is Tammy, what's up?'

storylines.name: ME-NW-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Nothing, sorry to bother you?
I'm an intern and I forgot my ID.
Help me get in.

storylines.name: ME-NW-Bye
content: Nadine: 'Nothing, sorry to bother you.'
Tammy: 'oh okay, well let me know if you need anything!'

storylines.name: ME-NW-Intern
content: Nadine: 'I'm an intern in the Sales department! Just started last week'
Tammy: 'Ahh how exciting! How are you finding it?'
Nadine: 'It's not bad, it's stressful.'
Tammy: 'Ahhh fair enough, you'll get used to it!'

Nadine: 'Haha I hope so, I was wondering if you could help me, I can't find my ID, think I left it at home, would you be able to get me through? I reeeeally don't wanna get in trouble with my manager.'
Tammy: 'uhhh I don't know...'

storylines.name: ME-NW-HelpMe-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
You know what? Never mind.
Please, I don't wanna get in trouble.
I'd help you if you were me.

storylines.name: ME-NW-Nevermind
content: Nadine: 'You know what? Never mind, I'll find another way in.'
Tammy: 'Okay, I'm sorry I can't help you.'

storylines.name: ME-NW-Begging
content: Nadine: 'Please, I really don't wanna get in trouble with my boss.'
Tammy: 'Ahhhhh I don't know...'
Tammy: 'Okay fine, come with me.'

storylines.name: ME-NW-ShowCompassion
content: Nadine: 'If you were in this position, I'd help you out.'
Tammy: 'Ahhhhh I don't know...'
Nadine: 'Please Tammy, if I'm late, they'll fire me without even thinking about it.'
Tammy: '....... Okay fine, come with me.'

storylines.name: ME-NW-GetMeIn
content: Nadine: 'I was wondering if you'd help me get in.'
Tammy: 'Oh do you work here too?'

storylines.name: ME-NW-GetMeIn-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
I work in Technical.
I work in Sales.
No, just visiting.
What's it to ya?

storylines.name: ME-NW-WorkInTechnical
content: Nadine: 'I work as in the Technical department!'
Tammy: 'Oh really? I haven't seen you there before, when did you join?'
Nadine: 'Ermmm... like a week ago?'
Tammy: 'Really? Sure about that?'

storylines.name: ME-NW-TechnicalCaught
content: Nadine looks a bit sheepish, having been caught out by Tammy.

storylines.name: ME-NW-TammyCaughtYou
content: Nadine: 'Sorry to bother you.'
Tammy: 'Yeah okay Michonne.'

storylines.name: ME-NW-WorkInSales
content: Nadine: 'Yeah, I work in the Sales department.'
Tammy: 'Oh cool, I was just about to head up, wanna come with?'
Nadine: 'Sure, let's go!'

storylines.name: ME-NW-Visiting
content: Nadine: 'No, I'm just visiting'
Tammy: 'Oh who are you visiting?'
Nadine: 'Oh some members of the Sales team!'
Nadine: 'Would you be able to take me up?'
Tammy: 'Sure! You're all signed in right?'
Nadine: 'Yep! I was gonna go up but I thought I'd say hi.'
Tammy: 'Fair enough, let's go!'

storylines.name: ME-NW-MindYoBusiness
content: Nadine: 'What's it to ya?'
Tammy: 'Oh I was just wondering sorry.'
Nadine: 'Yeah you should be. Bye.'

storylines.name: ME-NW-Leaves
content: Nadine walks away back into the main foyer area.

storylines.name: ME-NW-GoingIn
content: Tammy puts her laptop in her bag and gets up to make her way to the security gates.
Nadine follows her to the security gate.

storylines.name: ME-NW-CredentialCheck
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: ME-NW-NadineGetsIn
content: Tammy and Nadine approach the security stationed at the security gates.
Tammy is talking to them very quietly so Nadine can't hear them.
Eventually after the security guards talk into their radio, they wave Nadine through and swipe her in, with Tammy following behind.

storylines.name: ME-NW-TammyAndTheLift
content: Tammy: 'Awesome, right, let's get you up to the Sales floor, lucky for you I have permissions to get you up there!'
Nadine: 'Yeah, lucky me...'

storylines.name: ME-NW-NadTanInLift
content: Tammy swipes her pass and hits the button for the 9th floor.
The lift zooms them up to the 9th floor in no time.

storylines.name: ME-NW-TammySaysBye
content: Tammy: 'This is you! Please try and not forget your pass again, you might not be so lucky next time 😅'
Nadine: 'Definitely not, thank you so much, I owe you one!'

storylines.name: ME-NW-Nadine9thFloor
content: Nadine says her goodbyes and steps out of the lift onto the 9th floor.
The lift doors close and Tammy continues on up to the Technical department's floors.

storylines.name: ME-NW-NadineIsApprehended
content: They walk up to the gate, Tammy swipes her pass and Nadine tries to sneak in behind her.
A security guard grabs her arm as she gets through the barrier.

storylines.name: ME-NW-CaughtByGuard
content: Security-Guard: 'Stop! What do you think you're doing?'
Nadine: 'What are you talking about? I swiped my pass, let go of me!'
Security-Guard: 'Don't lie to me, you're coming with me!'

storylines.name: ME-NW-ByeTammyHelloSecurity
content: Tammy continues towards the lift, and more security guards are swarming Nadine.
They whisk Nadine off to a room with nothing but a table. a chair and a one way mirror.
After seizing her devices and hours of questioning, it doesn't take them long to figure out why she was there
Later, the police came and arrested Nadine for attempted burglary and corporate espionage.

storylines.name: ME-NervousMan
content: Nadine approaches the guy looking very nervous, clutching what looks to be his CV.
He keeps reading over it, in what looks like an attempt to calm himself down.

storylines.name: ME-NM-Introduction
content: Nadine: 'Hi there, my name is Denise! How are you?'
Nervous-Guy: 'Um hey'
Nervous-Guy: 'sorry I'm a bit busy right now, I'm still preparing for my interview, do you need something?'

storylines.name: ME-NM-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
I'm from HR
Nope, sorry to bother you.
Your interview has been cancelled

storylines.name: ME-NM-HR
content: Nadine: 'Yes in fact I'm from HR, they sent me down just to check on you and see how you're doing'
Nadine: 'They're going to be a while, didn't want you worrying too much down here haha'
Nervous-Guy: 'oh I apologise! I didn;t know sorry, I am a bit nervous but I guess that's normal I suppose 😅'
Nadine: 'Of course! Don't worry, I'm sure you'll do amazing!'

storylines.name: ME-NM-Decision-2
content: What does Nadine do?
Ask for his CV.
Ask for his CV and say they've stopped interviewing
Leave him be.

storylines.name: ME-NM-CV-Good
content: Nadine: 'Oh before I forget!'
Nervous-Guy: 'Oh? What is it?'
Nadine: 'They wanted me to get a copy of your CV, before I go back up, you wouldn't happen to have a copy would you?'
Nervous-Guy: 'Of course, take this copy!'
Nadine: 'Oh tha-'

storylines.name: ME-NM-CV-Scramble
content: He scrambles amongst his papers and pulls out a CV neatly packaged in a plastic wallet.
He thrusts into Nadine's hands before she could even finish thanking him.
Nadine leaves the Nervous Guy to read over his other copy of his CV
He looks like he's one step away from rocking himself into insanity in a corner

storylines.name: ME-NM-CV-Bad
content: Nadine: 'Oh I forgot to tell you!'
Nervous-Guy: 'Oh no, what is it? What happened?'
Nadine: 'They wanted me to tell you that they're not interviewing anymore people but to get a copy of your CV.'
Nadine: 'Before I go back up, you wouldn't happen to have a copy would you?'
Nervous-Guy: 'Oh no....'
Nervous-Guy: 'Ermm, here take this copy...'
Nadine: 'Oh thanks! Well good luck with your application!'

storylines.name: ME-NM-CV-Bad-Result
content: He pulls out a CV neatly packaged in a plastic wallet and hands it to Nadine
He leaves the foyer of the building, like a dog with its tail between its legs

storylines.name: ME-NM-LeaveHim
content: Nadine: 'Well good luck! Hope you do well!'
Nervous-Guy: 'Thank you, I hope I get it 😅'

storylines.name: ME-NM-LeaveHim-Bye
content: Nadine leaves him to study his CV

storylines.name: ME-NM-Bye
content: Nadine: 'Nothing, sorry to bother you.'

storylines.name: ME-NM-Indifferent
content: The nervous guy looked at Nadine with curiosity, then immeadiately returns to reading his CV.

storylines.name: ME-NM-InterviewCancelled
content: Nadine: 'I'm sorry, to tell you, your interview has been cancelled. They sent me down to tell all our applicants'
Nervous-Guy: 'You've got to be kidding, oh my god.'
Nadine: 'Sorry, we will let you know if anything changes'

storylines.name: ME-NM-SadBoi
content: He gets up and leaves the foyer, like a dog with its tail between its legs

storylines.name: ME-SuitMan
content: Nadine approaches a man in a suit, on his phone sending emails

storylines.name: ME-SM-NadineApproaches
content: Nadine: 'Hi there, my name is Shontelle, how are you?'
Suit-Guy: 'oh hey, can I help you or something?'

storylines.name: ME-SM-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Nope, sorry to bother you.
Wanted to ask about what do you do.
Can you get me inside?

storylines.name: ME-SM-Bye
content: Nadine: 'Nothing, sorry to bother you.'

storylines.name: ME-SM-Occupation
content: Nadine: 'Just wondering, what do you do?'
Suit-Guy: 'Marketing, you?'

storylines.name: ME-SM-Department-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Technical
Marketing
R&D
Sales

storylines.name: ME-SM-Technical
content: Nadine: 'I'm in the Technical department'
Suit-Guy: 'Ahhh a techie, boring. Sorry can't help, go hack your way in, robot.'

storylines.name: ME-SM-Marketing
content: Nadine: 'I'm in the Marketing department too!'
Suit-Guy: 'Really now? Didn't know we had new starts.'
Nadine: 'Actually I just transferred in.'
Suit-Guy: 'huh okay, what's your name?'
Nadine: 'it's Melissa, nice to meet you.'
Suit-Guy: 'Great to meet you, I'm David, I'm one of the managers in the Marketing department.'
Suit-Guy: 'Right, let's get you sorted.'

storylines.name: ME-SM-R+D
content: Nadine: 'I'm in the R&D department'
Suit-Guy: 'Coool, someone who knows how to exploit the innocent.'
Nadine: 'Erm....'
Suit-Guy: 'No no, it's cool, it's not like that I know. Alright I'll help you, what's your name again?'
Nadine: 'it's Melissa'
Suit-Guy: 'Nice to meet you, I'm David, let's get you sorted so you can leave me alone.'
Nadine: 'Erm sure.'

storylines.name: ME-SM-Sales
content: Nadine: 'I'm in the Sales department'
Suit-Guy: 'Ahhh how boring. Sorry can't help you, go find someone else to bother.'

storylines.name: ME-SM-SecurityGates
content: David and Nadine walk up to the security stationed at the security gates.
David has a brief chat with them and they quickly open the gate for us to pass.

storylines.name: ME-SM-DavidLeaves
content: David: 'Right, which department were you again?'

storylines.name: ME-SM-DepartmentCheck
content: ME-SM-Marketing

storylines.name: ME-SM-SameFloor
content: Nadine: 'Ermmm, the R&D Department?'
Suit-Guy: 'You sure about that? You sound hesistant'
Nadine: 'Uhhh-'
Suit-Guy: 'I'm just messing with ya, let's get going, I'm already late.'

storylines.name: ME-SM-DifferentFloor
content: Nadine: 'Ermmm, the Marketing Department?'
Suit-Guy: 'You sure about that? You sound hesistant'
Nadine: 'Uhhh-'
Suit-Guy: 'I'm just messing with ya, let's get going, I'm already late.'

storylines.name: ME-SM-InLift
content: They both walk into a lift.
Inside the lift there is a contact point for a swipe card, and a guide for the different departments.

storylines.name: ME-SM-DepartmentCheck-2
content: ME-SM-Marketing

storylines.name: ME-SM-TwoStopsLift
content: David scans his pass and presses the button for the 13th and the 22nd floor for the R&D department.
The lift starts zooming up to the 13th floor and stops at the Marketing department

storylines.name: ME-SM-DavidsFloor
content: Suit-Guy: 'This is my floor Nadine, lovely meeting you, goodbye my girl'
Nadine: 'Great to mee-'

storylines.name: ME-SM-DavidsGoodbye
content: Before she could finish her sentence, he had stepped out and the lift doors were closing.
Real classy....
The lift continues onto the 22nd floor.

storylines.name: ME-SM-JustThirteen
content: David scans his pass and presses the button for the 13th floor for the Marketing department.
The lift starts zooming up to the 13th floor and stops at the Marketing department.

storylines.name: ME-SM-LateForMeeting
content: Suit-Guy: 'This is us Nadine, I'm already late so I'll just say goodbye now'
Nadine: 'Great to mee-'

storylines.name: ME-SM-DavidPowerWalksAway
content: Before she could finish her sentence, he had already power walked off toward a large conference room.
Real classy.

storylines.name: ME-SM-GetMeIn
content: Nadine: 'Can you help me get inside? I seem to have forgotten my ID.'
Suit-Guy: 'Sorry bucko, can't help ya there, go find some other schmuck.'

storylines.name: ME-SM-NadineShotDown
content: Nadine: 'Oh okay, thanks I guess...'

storylines.name: ME-SW-HalfArsedBye
content: The guy in the suit just mumbled something at her and went back to sending more emails.

storylines.name: MainEntrance-AnyoneLeft
content: ME-NerdyWoman
ME-NervousMan
ME-SuitMan

storylines.name: MainEntrance-TalkedToEveryone
content: Nadine has spoken to everyone who's in the foyer. She decides to walk up to the reception desk

storylines.name: 11AMStart-Decision
content: How should Nadine break into the HealthCorp HQ?
Through the Underground Car Park
Via the Main Entrance

storylines.name: 11AM-UGCarPark
content: Nadine gets in her car and drives to the HealthCorp HQ. She pulls up at the entrance to their underground car park.
As she pulls up closer, she sees the security guard in the booth, put their hand up, signalling to stop.

storylines.name: 11AM-MainEntrance
content: Nadine takes the metro to the HealthCorp HQ. Eventually, she arrives and notices that the area around the HQ is very busy.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NoCredentials
content: Security-Guard: 'Hi there, ID please.'
Nadine: 'I'm afraid I don't have any.'
Security-Guard: 'I can't let you in unless you have your work ID on you'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NC-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
Yes you can.
I was called in by my manager.
Forgot something at my desk.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NC-YesYouCan
content: Nadine: 'Yes you can, I was called in by my manager, I was in a rush because they said it was an emergency.'
Nadine: 'It's none of your business anyway'
Security-Guard: 'No ma'am, in fact what you do in this building IS my business.'
Security-Guard: 'I'm gonna have to ask you to park in the security bay.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NC-MyManager
content: Nadine: 'I was called in by my manager, not sure why but it sounded like an emergency, and I forgot my ID at home'
Security-Guard: 'Do you have any way to prove that?'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NC-MyDesk
content: Nadine: 'Oh I forgot some important files at my desk, was going to work from home tomorrow haha, must have forgotten my ID'
Security-Guard: 'Ahh one of those days huh? That's fine, I'll let you through'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-SecurityBay
content: Nadine parks in the security bay.
She turns off the engine and watches as the security guard radioes for what she presumes is backup.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-SB-Decision
content: What does Nadine do?
*reverses away and leaves*
Waits in her car.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-Waits
content: Nadine decides to wait in her car for Security to arrive.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
No, is that a problem?
My work phone is out of charge.
Why do you care?

storylines.name: UGCarPark-MadeItIn
content: The security guard lifts the barrier to the car park.
Nadine drives down the dark tunnel.
She parks her car and starts to make her way to the nearby lift.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NadineIsAKaren
content: Nadine: 'I can't, is that a problem?'
Security-Guard: 'Yes, you're going have to park in the security bay and come with me.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-WorkPhone
content: Nadine: 'I'm sorry, my work phone's dead and he called me, please it's urgent, I don't have time to waste.'
Security-Guard: 'Okay, please park in the security bay while I make a couple calls.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-ConfrontationalNadine
content: Nadine: 'Why do you care? I'm just trying to do my job, why you gotta question me?'
Security-Guard: 'I'm just trying to do MY job and I'm not letting you in until you either have your manager on the phone'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-CN-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
*reverses away and leaves*
You're not gonna do anything.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-BookIt
content: Nadine shifts her car into reverse and quickly backs it up into the side street.
She floors it and speeds away from the HQ.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-BreakInRuined
content: The Break in is ruined, HealthCorp are going to expect her now.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-AggyNadine
content: Nadine: 'What you're gonna do is let me in before I get my ass handed to me by my boss.'
Security-Guard: 'Look, how about you tell me who your boss is and I can call them myself.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-AggyNadine-Decision
content: What does Nadine say?
No.
*reverses away and leaves*
*gives them Darren's name*
*gives them Danielle's name*

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NadineIsBeingAwks
content: Nadine: 'No! Why should I??'
Security-Guard: 'Right, your options are you leave and don't come back, or you're coming with me.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-Darren
content: Nadine: 'He's called Darren Anderson.'
Security-Guard: 'Okay, stay right here, I'll give him a call.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-Danielle
content: Nadine: 'She's called Danielle Winters.'
Security-Guard: 'Okay, stay right here, I'll give her a call.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-Darren-2
content: The Security Guard returns to his booth to call Darren
After a short amount of time, he returns to Nadine's car

storylines.name: UGCarPark-Danielle-2
content: The Security Guard returns to his booth to call Danielle
After a short amount of time, he returns to Nadine's car

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NadineDarrenCheck-1
content: DarrenIsAThreat

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NadineDanielleCheck
content: NadineOffendedDan

storylines.name: UGCarPark-DanielleDoesntKnowYou
content: Security-Guard: 'Well, she's claiming that she's never heard of you.'
Security-Guard: 'I'm gonna have to ask you to come with me, ma'am.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-DanielleVouches
content: Security-Guard: 'Just got off the phone with her, everything checks out. Carry on.'
Nadine: 'About time as well.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-DarrenDoesntKnowYou
content: Security-Guard: 'Well, he's claiming that he's never heard of you.'
Security-Guard: 'I'm gonna have to ask you to come with me, ma'am.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-DarrenVouches
content: Security-Guard: 'Just got off the phone with him, everything checks out. Carry on.'
Nadine: 'About time as well.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-TheyreWaitingForYou
content: The Security Guard directs Nadine into the security bay, where she sees several other guards there, waiting.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-Ultimatum
content: What does Nadine say?
No.
*reverses away and leaves*

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NadineIsInTrouble
content: Nadine: 'No! Fuck you!'
Security-Guard: 'Have it your way.'

storylines.name: UGCarPark-ItsEscalating
content: The Security Guard calls for backup and they quickly surround Nadine.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-ImpoundedCar
content: Nadine's car gets impounded and she's taken in by HealthCorp security for questioning.
After seizing her devices and hours of questioning, it doesn't take them long to figure out why she was there.

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NadineDevicesSeized
content: After seizing her devices and hours of questioning, it doesn't take them long to figure out why she was there

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NIT-Danielle
content: DanielleHooksNadUp

storylines.name: UGCarPark-NIT-Darren
content: Darren email

storylines.name: DanielleGotGot
content: They found out her source was Danielle, who was also questioned and fired on the spot.
Later, the police came and arrested Nadine and Danielle for attempted burglary, aiding and abetting and corporate espionage.

storylines.name: DarrenGotGot
content: They found out her source was Darren, who was also questioned and fired on the spot.
He was very confused and denied it, because he didn't know Nadine was impersonating Jack.
Nevertheless, the police came and arrested Nadine and Darren for attempted burglary, aiding and abetting and corporate espionage.

content: Thank you for playing the Vigilante!
This isn't the end, your save game is cleared so you can play again!

storylines.name: END GAME
content: END GAME

content: Later, the police came and arrested Nadine for attempted burglary and corporate espionage.
